articles.description: It has been 33 years since she filmed her very first scene as Brooke Logan, one of the most – if not the most – famous soap opera characters in the world.
articles.content:
It has been 33 years since she filmed her very first scene as Brooke Logan, one of the most if not the most famous soap opera characters in the world.
And to this day, Katherine Kelly Lang can still… [+4204 chars]
